alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 8:12PM CDT until May 09 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Little Osage River at Fulton affecting Bourbon County. Marmaton River near Nevada affecting Vernon County. Osage River near Schell City affecting Vernon and Bates Counties. Osage River at Taberville affecting St. Clair County. For the Little Osage River Basin...including Fulton, Horton... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Marmaton River Basin...including Fort Scott, Nevada...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Osage River Basin...including Schell City, Taberville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Osage River at Taberville. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.3 feet, The handicapped access to the Osage River launch area floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 23.6 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.5 feet on 01/19/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 815 PM CDT.
